item.title: Detecting demand outliers in transport systems
item.description: I recently completed my PhD at STOR-i CDT at Lancaster University. My thesis was titled “Detecting demand outliers in transport systems” and here I’ll (try to) give a brief overview of the work I’ve done in the last three years. The final version of my thesis can be found here. What are demand outliers? An outlier is generally considered an abnormal event that doesn’t fit with the pattern of events normally observed.
